title: Trump Impeachment, VA Rep. Spanberger
itunes:title: Trump Impeachment, VA Rep. Spanberger
description:
Guests: Rick Davis, Partner at Stone Court Capital, former campaign manager for John McCain's 2008 presidential campaign, and Bloomberg politics contributor, Chuck Rocha, former Senior Advisor for the Bernie Sanders 2016 and 2020 Presidential campaigns, and Rep. Abigail Spanberger, a Democrat representing Virginia's 7th Congressional district. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
